document_data.mainbody: errell was one of the Blades of the Old Man in the fortress of Sentinelspire. He was a part of the team accompanying Sauk to look for Kheil and secure the Eraellen in the Northern Shalhoond in Tarsakh of , conspiring to kill the Old Man of the Mountain. He was a westerner, with round eyes and pale skin he helped Sauk ambush Berun.
